Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.label: canine
Pawnmorph.Hediffs.MutationDef.description: Golden- or orange-colored wolf eyes with a large, black-ringed iris. They look striking, especially on a mutated human, but alas they are red-green colorblind. They also have inferior visual acuity compared to a human's eyes, but they're well adapted to noticing motion. A morph with these eyes will suffer at most vision-related tasks but once they adapt to the specialized senses they will fare better in melee combat than a baseline human.
